text: @WHO @WHOWPRO @WHOSEARO @WHO_Europe @pahowho @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO I don't think garlic will prevent catching anything, however, it is delicious in foods. I recommend not mixing up bulbs and cloves of garlic in a recipe. Yes, personal experience... 😶😃😜
